mean_cn: n. 航空公司，航空系统，（飞机的）航线；  adj. 航空公司的，在航线上的
mean_en: a company that owns and operates many airplanes which are used for carrying passengers and goods to different places
word_etyma: air空气，空运+line直线→航空系统，航线
sentence: This airline only flies you to places the pilots really want to visit!
sentence_trans: 这家航空公司只带你飞去驾驶员想去的地方！
